parameters.name: single_session_id_to_use
parameters.description: Provide a single session ID <subjectID>_<yyyy-mm-dd> (default empty: run for all sessions in datacube)

parameters.name: session_table_query
parameters.description: Query text to pass to df.query(), for filtering session_table (sessions excluded by filter are not processed)

parameters.name: test
parameters.description: Run the capsule in test mode, which should finish quickly

parameters.name: update_packages_from_source
parameters.description: If 1, auto-updates package(s) (e.g. dynamic-routing-analysis) on each run. Disable for quicker testing

parameters.name: override_params_json
parameters.description: A json string of parameters to pass to Params class. Keys must be fields on Params class. Overrides values specified individually in App Builder
